Great Deep Sea.name: Great Deep Sea
Great Deep Sea.description:
A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.
This transcription of the Great Ones' inhuman voices depicts
downreaching currents. This rune means "Deep Sea," and
grants augmented general resistance.
Great volumes of water serve as a bulwark guarding sleep,
and an augur of the eldritch Truth.
Overcome this hindrance, and seek what is yours.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice | 2r8ghidm Sinister Lower Hintertomb L2, side area before layer boss [tested July 23, 2017]
Tier 2: Treasure in Nightmare Frontier, end of the Swamp Cave path in Tombstone Swamp before Amygdala
Tier 3: Treasure in Isz Root Chalice [5xe4d3ny, FR Isz Gravestone L1, side area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]

Communion.name: Communion
Communion.description:
A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.
Several runes relate to "blood," including "Communion,"
which raises the maximum number of blood vials
one may carry.
This rune represents the Healing Church and its
ministers. Blood ministration is, of course, the pursuit
of communion.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Healing Church Workshop, chest inside the room after Oedon Chapel elevator
Tier 2: Treasure in Lecture Building 2F, at the end Lecture Theater Balcony 1
Tier 3: Treasure in Iosefka's Clinic, chest inside Rear Operating Room on the 2F of the Clinic
Tier 4: Dropped by Celestial Emissary in Upper Cathedral Ward Lumenflower Gardens
Tier 5: Treasure in Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice | rg56w9w8, FR Pthumeru Ihyll L1, side area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]; [pd5scth3, FRC Pthumeru Ihyll L1]

Beast.name: Beast
Beast.description:
A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.
A transcription of the roar of a labyrinth beast, the bearer of 
the "Beast" rune has accentuated transformation effects.
"Beast" is one of the early Caryll Runes, as well as one of the
first to be deemed forbidden. The discovery of blood entailed 
the discovery of undesirable beasts.
availability_list: Tier 1: Dropped by Beast-possessed Soul, base of the Tower in Healing Church Workshop
Tier 2: Dropped by Afflicted Beggar in Forbidden Woods Windmil Balconies, near where Cannon can be found. Cathedral Ward Outside Oedon Chapel, after telling him about this safe place
Tier 3: Treasure in Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice | 279c3aqs, Rotted Lower Loran L1, bonus area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]

Dissipating Lake.name: Dissipating Lake
Dissipating Lake.description:
A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.
This transcription of the Great Ones' inhuman voices 
ripples like a watery reflection. This rune means "Lake,"
and those branded by it enjoy augmented defense.
Great volumes of water serve as a bulwark guarding sleep, 
and an augur of the eldritch Truth.
Overcome this hindrance, and seek what is yours.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Forbidden Woods, Boar Creek under the roots guarded by Rotted Corpses
Tier 2: Treasure in Ailing Loran Root Chalice | r4qs4gux, Ailing Loran L1, side area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]
Tier 3: Treasure in Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice | 97zvbb6v, Lower Loran L1, side area before layer boss [tested July 23, 2017]

Milkweed.name: Milkweed
Milkweed.description:
A Caryll rune envisioned by Adeline, patient of the 
research hall.

A transcription of the inhuman, sticky whispers that reveal 
the nature of a celestial attendant.

Those who take this oath become a lumenwood that peers 
towards the sky, feeding phantasms in its luscious bed. 
Phantasms guide us and lead us to further discoveries.
availability_list: Acquired from (Main Game): Adeline, Research Hall Patient, you need to give her 3 Brain Fluids in the Research Halls. All three can be found in the Research Hall.

Beast's Embrace.name: Beast's Embrace
Beast's Embrace.description:
After repeated experiments in controlling the scourge of 
beasts, the gentle "Embrace" rune was discovered.

When its implementation failed, the "Embrace" became a 
forbidden rune, but its knowledge became a foundation of 
the Healing Church.

Those who swear this oath take on a ghastly form, and enjoy 
accentuated transformation effects, especially while wielding 
a beast weapon.
availability_list: Dropped by (Main Game): Laurence, the First Vicar in Nightmare Grand Cathedral. To acquire this rune you will first need to get Laurence's Skull from the hidden altar in the Recovery Room, and then take it to the Nightmare Grand Cathedral in the Hunter's Nightmare so that you can face Laurence, the First Vicar. Upon defeating him you will automatically get the rune.

Great Lake.name: Great Lake
Great Lake.description:
A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.
This transcription of the Great Ones' inhuman voices ripples
like a watery reflection. This rune means "Lake," and those
who memorise it enjoy general reduced damage.
Great volumes of water serve as a bulwark guarding sleep, 
and an augur of the eldritch Truth.
Overcome this hindrance, and seek what is yours.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice, 8jv9v6bc, Lower Hintertomb L1, bonus area before layer boss [tested July 23, 2017]
Tier 2: Treasure in Upper Cathedral Ward, Statue Balcony to the right of the main gate
Tier 3: Treasure in Isz Root Chalice | 7fwgga2i, F/R/C Isz Gravestone L1, side area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]; [dry39ytc, F/R Isz Gravestone L1]; [xtbdb2qg, Isz Gravestone L2]

Heir.name: Heir
Heir.description:
A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.
The "Heir" sees sentimentality in the warmth of blood, and
acknowledges visceral attacks as one of the darker hunter
techniques.
More blood echoes gained from visceral attacks.
Perhaps the "Heir" is a hunter who bears the echoing will of
those before him.
availability_list: Tier 1: Dropped by Old Hunter Henryk in Central Yharnam Tomb of Oedon
Tier 2: Treasure in Yahar'gul, Unseen Village (Blood Moon), Widow's Requiem near second Bell Ringer
Tier 3: Treasure in Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice | df235ysm, FR Pthumeru Ihyll L1, side area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]

Blood Rapture.name: Blood Rapture
Blood Rapture.description:
A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds. 
"Blood Rapture" is the raw euphoria of the warmth of blood. 
Restores HP with visceral attacks, one of the darker hunter 
techniques. 
This rune resonates with servants of the Queen, carrier of 
the Child of Blood, who yearn for their Queen's blood with 
little hope of requitement. 
For them, they find solace in "Blood Rapture," that serves as 
a surrogate for their desires.
availability_list: Tier 1: Dropped by Shadow of Yharnam in the Forbidden Woods Forbidden Grave
Tier 2: Treasure in Cursed and Defiled Root Chalice | 3zcvutw8, FRC Cursed Pthumerian Defilement L1, bonus area before layer boss [tested July 23, 2017]
Tier 3: Dropped by Bloody Crow of Cainhurst in Cathedral Ward Grand Cathedral

Lake.name: Lake
Lake.description:
A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.
This transcription of the Great Ones' inhuman voices ripples
like a watery reflection. This rune means "Lake," and those
who memorise it enjoy reduced physical damage.
Great volumes of water serve as a bulwark guarding sleep, 
and an augur of the eldritch Truth.
Overcome this hindrance, and seek what is yours.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Hemwick Charnel Lane, at the end of Castle Bluff path straight from Hemwick Crossing
Tier 2: Treasure in Cursed and Defiled Root Chalice | vxnwjixk, F/R/C Cursed Pthumerian Defilement L1, side area before layer boss [tested July 23, 2017]

Tier 3: Treasure in Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice | qtpuhk46, F/R Pthumeru Ihyll L1, side area before layer boss [tested July 23, 2017]; [df235ysm, F/R Pthumeru Ihyll L2]; [rg56w9w8, F/R/C Pthumeru Ihyll L2]

Clockwise Metamorphosis.name: Clockwise Metamorphosis
Clockwise Metamorphosis.description:
A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.
The twisted cross means "metamorphosis."
Rotated clockwise, this rune boosts HP.
The discovery of blood made their dream of evolution 
a reality. Metamorphosis, and the excesses and deviation
that followed. were only the beginning.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Forbidden Woods, Graveyard Path near locked gate
Tier 2: Treasure in Nightmare Frontier, Lower Caves leading into Central Swamp Bank

Tier 3: Treasure in Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice, abbbxezk, F/R Pthumeru Ihyll L1 side area before layer boss [tested July 23, 2017]; wc3x5v4n, F/R Pthumeru Ihyll L1, side area before layer boss [tested Jan 27, 2017]; [9vb3tzza, Pthumeru Ihyll L2]

Clawmark.name: Clawmark
Clawmark.description:
A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.
The "Clawmark" is an impulse to seek the warmth of blood
like a beast. It strengthens visceral attacks, one of the darker
hunter techniques.
Although the difference is subtle, Runesmith Caryll describes
the "Beast" as a horrific and unwelcome instinct deep within
the hearts of men, while "Clawmark" is an alluring invitation
to accept this very nature.
availability_list: Tier 1: Dropped by Yahar'gul Hunter (Beast Claw & Hunter Pistol) in Yahar'gul, Unseen Village (Blood Moon) Yahar'gul Chapel
Tier 2: Dropped by Gilbert, return to his house when the Blood Moon is out and defeat nearby Beast Patient

Tier 3: Treasure in Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice | 6q77zr9h, FRC Lower Loran L1 side area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017] | gz9mmj7y, FR Lower Loran L1 side area before layer lamp [tested Oct 18, 2015]

Stunning Deep Sea.name: Stunning Deep Sea
Stunning Deep Sea.description:
A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.
This transcription of the Great Ones' inhuman voices depicts
downreaching currents. This rune means "Deep Sea," and
grants augmented rapid poison resistance.
Great volumes of water serve as a bulwark guarding sleep,
and an augur of the eldritch Truth.

Overcome this hindrance, and seek what is yours.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice | nynpssra Lower Hintertomb L2, side area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]
Tier 2: Treasure in Nightmare Frontier, Upper Caves after the Broken Tombstone shortcut
Tier 3: Treasure in Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice | rie8jhve, F/R/C Lower Loran L1, side area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]

Hunter.name: Hunter
Hunter.description:
A Caryll Rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.
This red-smudged rune means "Hunter," and has been
adopted by those who have taken the Hunter of Hunters
oath.
These watchmen admonish those who have become addled
with blood. Be they men or beasts, anyone who has
threatened the pledgers of the "Hunter" oath surely has an
issue with blood.
availability_list: Acquire from (Main Story): Eileen the Crow in Cathedral Ward Grand Cathedral [Blood Moon]. Speak to Eileen after defeating the Bloody Crow of Cainhurst

Formless Oedon.name: Formless Oedon
Formless Oedon.description:
A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.
The Great One Oedon, lacking form, exists only in voice,
and is symbolised by this rune. Those who memorise it enjoy
a larger supply of Quicksilver Bullets.
Human or no, the oozing blood is a medium of the highest
grade, and the essence of the formless Great One, Oedon.
Both Oedon, and his inadvertent worshippers, surreptitiously
seek the precious blood.
availability_list: Tier 1: Acquired from Young Girl, send her to Iosefka's Clinic and kill Small Celestial Emissary when accessed from the Forbidden Woods
Tier 2: Treasure in Lower Pthumeru Root Chalice | p3anuwen, Lower Pthumeru L2, bonus area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]
Tier 3: Dropped by Oedon Chapel Dweller in Cathedral Ward Oedon Chapel

Tier 4: Treasure in Healing Church Workshop, upper level of the Oedon Chapel. To reach it you'll need to ride elevator to the Healing Church Workshop and step off just before it reaches the top, then follow the rooftops back into the chapel
Tier 5: Treasure in Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice | wikifcsa, FRC Pthumeru Ihyll L1, side are before layer boss [tested July 23, 2017]

Clear Deep Sea.name: Clear Deep Sea
Clear Deep Sea.description:
A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.

This transcription of the Great Ones' inhuman voices depicts
downreaching currents. This rune means "Deep Sea," and
grants augmented slow poison resistance.
Great volumes of water serve as a bulwark guarding sleep,
and an augur of the eldritch Truth.
Overcome this hindrance, and seek what is yours.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Forbidden Woods, end of the Cliffside Path behind the tombstone
Tier 2: Treasure in Nightmare Frontier, Rocky Outcrop on the other side of Central Swamp Bank
Tier 3: Treasure in Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice, rvx9wya7, Lower Loran L1, bonus area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]

Anti-Clockwise Metamorphosis.name: Anti-Clockwise Metamorphosis
Anti-Clockwise Metamorphosis.description:
A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.
The twisted cross means "metamorphosis."
Rotated anti-clockwise, this rune boosts stamina.
The discovery of blood made their dream of evolution 
a reality, Metamorphosis, and the excesses and deviation 
that followed, was only the beginning.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Forbidden Woods, Ravine Floor guarded by Small Celestial Emissaries
Tier 2: Acquired from Patches the Spider, confront him in the Lecture Building after defeating Amygdala and speak to him face-to-face
Tier 3: Treasure in Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice, jtjuh8gc, FRC Lower Loran L1 side area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017], [h3up6y2d, Lower Loran L1]

Corruption.name: Corruption
Corruption.description:
A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.
Several runes contain a nuance of "Blood," including the
rune of "Corruption," associated with the oath of the corrupt.
Pledgers to this oath are Cainhurst Vilebloods, hunters of
blood who find dregs for their Queen in coldblood,
particularly in that of hunters.
Yet the corrupt are heretics in the eyes of the Church, and
thus subject to the wrath of the Executioners.
availability_list: Acquired from (Main Story): Annalise, Queen of Castle Cainhurst in Forsaken Cainhurst Castle Queen's Chamber [Night / Blood Moon]. Swear an oath to the Vilebloods

Fading Lake.name: Fading Lake
Fading Lake.description:
A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.
This transcription of the Great Ones' inhuman voices ripples
like a watery reflection. This rune means "Lake," and those
who memorise it enjoy reduced fire damage.
Great volumes of water serve as bulwark guarding sleep,
and an augur of the eldritch Truth.
Overcome this hindrance, and seek what is yours.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Nightmare Frontier, end of Hunter's Ledge path next to Central Swamp
Tier 2: Treasure in Ailing Loran Root Chalice | 9d6vhapi, Ailing Loran L1, bonus area before layer boss [tested July 23, 2017]
Tier 3: Treasure in Lower Ailing Loran Root Chalice | 4jgecv28, F/R Lower Loran L1, side area before layer boss [tested July 23, 2017]

Impurity.name: Impurity
Impurity.description:
A Carryl rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.
This rune, discovered inside the forbidden beast eater, came 
to symbolize "Impurity," and the oath of the League.

Confederates of The League cooperate with hunters from 
other worlds, and hunt to discover vermin.

Vermin writhe within filth, and are the root of man's 
impurity. Crush all vermin without hesitation.
availability_list: Acquired from (Main Story): Valtr, Master of the League in Forbidden Woods next to Forbidden Woods lamp [Night / Blood Moon]. Swear an oath to the League

Guidance.name: Guidance
Guidance.description:
A Caryll rune discovered by the old hunter Ludwig along 
with the Holy Moonlight Sword. 
Boosts amount of life recovered by rallying. 

When Ludwig closed his eyes, he saw darkness, or perhaps 
nothingness, and that is where he discovered the tiny beings 
of light. Ludwig was certain that these playful dancing 
sprites offered "guidance," and emptied Ludwig of his fears 
at least in the midst of a hunt.
availability_list: Tier 1: Dropped by (Main Game): Carrion Crow in Research Hall's top floor
Tier 2: Dropped by (Main Game): Ludwig, the Holy Blade in Hunter's Nightmare, Underground Corpse Pile
Tier 3: Depth 5 Root Dungeons [Not Found]

Arcane Lake.name: Arcane Lake
Arcane Lake.description:
A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.
This transcription of the Great Ones' inhuman voices 
ripples like a watery reflection. This rune means "Lake," 
and those branded by it enjoy augmented defense.
Great volumes of water serve as a bulwark guarding sleep, 
and an augur of the eldritch Truth.
Overcome this hindrance, and seek what is yours.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Yahar'gul, Unseen Village (Blood Moon), after Main Street Overpass where you teleported near Bell Ringer
Tier 2: Treasure in Byrgenwerth, Side Path guarded by the Brainsucker
Tier 3: Treasure in Isz Root Chalice, ydknsnh4, Isz Gravestone L1, bonus area before layer boss [tested July 23, 2017]

Moon.name: Moon
Moon.description:
A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.

A transcription of "moon," as spoken by the Great Ones
inhabiting the nightmare.

Gain more Blood Echoes.

The Great Ones that inhabit the nightmare are
sympathetic in spirit, and often answer when called upon.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Yahar'gul, Unseen Village (Evening), Yahar'gul Chapel
Tier 2: Treasure in Nightmare of Mensis, bottom of Ascending Staircase leading to Mergo's Loft: Middle Lamp
Tier 3: Perform "Make Contact" gesture after you drop Brain of Mensis in Nightmare of Mensis, the Abyss.

Deep Sea.name: Deep Sea
Deep Sea.description:
A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds. 
This transcription of the Great Ones' inhuman voices depicts
downreaching currents. This rune means "Deep Sea," and
grants augmented resistance. 
Great volumes of water serve as a bulwark guarding sleep,
and an augur of the eldritch Truth.
Overcome this hindrance, and seek what is yours.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Lower Hintertomb Root Chalice | 2xe8g93y FR Lower Hintertomb L1, bonus area before layer boss [tested July 23, 2017]
Tier 2: Treasure in Forbidden Woods, Overhanging Trees near two Large Snake Balls
Tier 3: Treasure in Isz Root Chalice | ydknsnh4, Isz Gravestone L1, side area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]

Oedon Writhe.name: Oedon Writhe
Oedon Writhe.description:
A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.
"Writhe" sees a subtle mucous in the warmth of blood, 
and acknowledges visceral attacks as one of the darker hunter
techniques. Visceral attacks restore Quicksilver Bullets.
Human or no. the oozing blood is a medium of the highest 
grade, and the essence of the formless Great One, Oedon.
Both Oedon, and Oedon's inadvertent worshippers, 
surreptitiously seek the precious blood.
availability_list: Tier 1: Dropped by Adella, Nun of the Healing Church; Treasure in Yahar'gul, Unseen Village Main Street, speak to Adella, Nun of the Healing Church in Yahar'gul, Storeroom (Evening) while wearing Healing Church clothing, but tell her about neither the clinic nor the chapel. She'll try returning to the Cathedral Ward, ending her quest. After killing Shadows of Yharnam in Forbidden Woods you can find her corpse on the Main Street on path to Tonitrus treasure in Yahar'gul, Unseen Village.
Tier 2: Dropped by Impostor Iosefka in Iosefka's Clinic before the Blood Moon
Tier 3: Treasure in Pthumeru Ihyll Root Chalice, 9vb3tzza, Pthumeru Ihyll L1 side area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]

Radiance.name: Radiance
Radiance.description:
A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.
The rune for "Radiance," adopted by the sworn
Executioners under Logarius' command.
The executioners despise the impure Vilebloods,
and no matter what the circumstances, would
never cooperate with the bloodthirsty hunters
who serve the undead queen, Annalise.
availability_list: Acquired from (Main Story): Alfred, Hunter of Vilebloods in Cathedral Ward Lower Chapel [Night / Blood Moon]. Complete Alfred's quest, found on his body in Cathedral Ward Lower Chapel where you first met him
Dropped by (Main Story): Alfred, Hunter of Vilebloods in Forsaken Cainhurst Castle Queen's Chamber [Night / Blood Moon]. After he gives you "Roar" gesture

Eye.name: Eye
Eye.description:
A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.
A transcription of "eye," as spoken by left-behind Great
Ones. Allows one to make additional discoveries.
Eyes symbolize the truth Master Willem sought in his
research. Disillusioned by the limits of human intellect,
Master Willem looked to beings from higher planes for
guidance, and sought to line his brain with eyes in order to
elevate his thoughts.
availability_list: Tier 1: Treasure in Nightmare of Mensis, near Mergo's Loft: Base Lamp
Tier 2: Dropped by Master Willem in Byrgenwerth Lunarium
Tier 3: Treasure in Isz Root Chalice and Sinister Isz Root Chalice,  jmph3q6e, Sinister Isz L1 side area before layer lamp [tested July 23, 2017]
